TopicTitle: Map view and Ship view simultaneously

Articles.Content: Just as the title says. Both views at the same time. Possible on separate screens or in a UI box. I don't know if there is a mod for this but if there is I might try it.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/76273-Stand-Alone-Map-View-Multi-monitor-KSP-0-23-5-WIP-Plugin

However, be aware that your computer will be running 2 copies of KSP to run this mod.
